thread.title: Zuckerberg's data shared with Cambridge Analytica

title: Zuckerberg's data shared with Cambridge Analytica
text:
Zuckerberg's data shared with Cambridge Analytica 4:42pm EDT - 01:51 
Facebook chief executive Mark Zuckerberg told lawmakers that he was among the 87 million Facebook users whose data was improperly shared with political consultancy Cambridge Analytica. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook chief executive Mark Zuckerberg told lawmakers that he was among the 87 million Facebook users whose data was improperly shared with political consultancy Cambridge Analytica. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JCGWUB
